subtitleNullable: Face Expression Recognition 2013 Dataset in Numpy
descriptionNullable:
Name: FER2013
Description: The FER2013 dataset is a facial expression recognition dataset consisting of 30,000 grayscale images of faces. The images are labeled with one of seven emotions: angry, disgust, fear, happy, sad, surprise, or neutral.
Classes: The seven classes in the FER2013 dataset are:
Angry (label 1)
Disgust (label 2)
Fear (label 3)
Happy (label 4)
Neutral (label 5)
Sad (label 6)
Surprise (label 7)

The FER2013 dataset is a challenging dataset for facial expression recognition, as the images are of low resolution and the emotions are often subtle. However, the dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers who are working on facial expression recognition algorithms.
